realm.name: altred-user
realm.description: General user in the altred environment without elevated rights

realm.name: altred-administrator
realm.description: Administrator in the altred environment with elevated rights

realm.name: altred-api-service
realm.description: General access requirements of altred microservices

altred-um.name: altred-um-administrator
altred-um.description: Administrator of the user-management microservice with elevated rights

altred-um.name: altred-microservice-user-management
altred-um.description: Access requirements needed by the user management microservice

altred-um.name: altred-um-user
altred-um.description: General user of the user-management microservice without elevated rights

clients.name: Altred - User Management
clients.description: Microservice responsible for user registration and management

clientScopes.name: roles
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add user roles to the access token

clientScopes.name: altred:um:write
clientScopes.description: Allows writing access to user management microservice

clientScopes.name: altred:um:write:all
clientScopes.description: Allows writing access to user management microservice with access to other users

clientScopes.name: altred:um:read:all
clientScopes.description: Allows reading access to user management microservice with access to other users

clientScopes.name: web-origins
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add allowed web origins to the access token

clientScopes.name: altred:um:read
clientScopes.description: Allows reading access to user management microservice
